entry.title: Readings for January 18
entry.content:
We will continue the discussion from Today. Read the Philosophical Investigations, §30-26. I will make this available electronically through the Dropbox folder.

In addition to this, there will be a short reading assignment due before our next meeting, corresponding to §6-21. The assignment will be posted in the next day or two.

Remember there is no class on Monday (University holiday).

UPDATE: You may also want to look at Soames’ Philosophical Analysis in the Twentieth Century, vol. 2, pp. 6-8.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content: This is the website for PHIL 428. Announcements, readings, and other relevant information will be posted here. If you are enrolled in this class, you should be checking this website regularly. You can follow the Twitter feed, if you are on Twitter. Otherwise, you can either subscribe to the RSS feed or simply come here regularly to stay up to date.
